model.ball

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ball.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Abstract representation of a ball. All concrete balls must implement the updateState method which defines the behavior of the ball.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(java.awt.Component component,
            IUpdateStrategy iUpdateStrategy,
            IPaintStrategy paint)
        Constructor for a Ball. Initial location, velocity and color are all randomly decided.
        Parameters:
        component - the containing component that this ball is drawn on
        iUpdateStrategy - the strategy the ball will be updated with
        paint - the paint strategy the ball will be painted with
